channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Planning Analytics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Planning Analytics

item.title: CVE-2020-4882|2024-08-04T08:14:59.167Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 could be vulnerable to a Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attack by constucting URLs from user-controlled data . This could enable attackers to make arbitrary requests to the internal network or to the local file system. IBM X-Force ID: 190852.

item.title: CVE-2020-4953|2024-08-04T08:14:59.139Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain information about an organization's internal structure by exposing sensitive information in HTTP repsonses. IBM X-Force ID: 192029.

item.title: CVE-2020-4361|2024-08-04T08:00:07.030Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information by disclosing private IP addresses in HTTP responses. IBM X-Force ID: 178766.

item.title: CVE-2020-4871|2024-08-04T08:14:59.102Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 190834.

item.title: CVE-2020-4653|2024-08-04T08:07:49.159Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim.

item.title: CVE-2021-38873|2024-08-04T01:51:20.475Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 is potentially vulnerable to CSV Injection. A remote attacker could execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of csv file contents. IBM X-Force ID: 208396.

item.title: CVE-2020-4527|2024-08-04T08:07:48.970Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the Secure flag for the session cookie in TLS mode. By intercepting its transmission within an HTTP session, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to capture the cookie and obtain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 182631.

item.title: CVE-2019-4612|2024-08-04T19:40:48.317Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 is vulnerable to malicious file upload in the My Account Portal. Attackers can make use of this weakness and upload malicious executable files into the system and it can be sent to victim for performing further attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 168523.

item.title: CVE-2020-4644|2024-08-04T08:07:49.175Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0.0 through 2.0.9.1 could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 185716.

item.title: CVE-2020-4764|2024-08-04T08:14:59.348Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 188898.

item.title: CVE-2020-4648|2024-08-04T08:07:49.204Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: A vulnerability exsists in IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 whereby avatars in Planning Analytics Workspace could be modified by other users without authorization to do so. IBM X-Force ID: 186019.

item.title: CVE-2020-4873|2024-08-04T08:14:59.214Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information due to an overly permissive CORS policy. IBM X-Force ID: 190836.

item.title: CVE-2019-4716|2024-08-04T19:40:49.095Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0.0 through 2.0.8 is vulnerable to a configuration overwrite that allows an unauthenticated user to login as "admin", and then execute code as root or SYSTEM via TM1 scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 172094.

item.title: CVE-2020-4881|2024-08-04T08:14:58.929Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the lack of server hostname verification for SSL/TLS communication. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 190851.

item.title: CVE-2019-4613|2024-08-04T19:40:48.319Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 168524.

item.title: CVE-2020-4645|2024-08-04T08:07:49.110Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0.0 through 2.0.9.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 185717.

item.title: CVE-2019-4611|2024-08-04T19:40:47.540Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 168519.

item.title: CVE-2020-4562|2024-08-04T08:07:48.993Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information by allowing cross-window communication with unrestricted target origin via documentation frames.
